epp:phrases.epp:phrase: You haven't specified a document type!
You need to select a file to be shown first.

epp:phrase.p: The amount of disk space available for new EPrints has dropped below the repository threshold. New disk space will be needed soon.
If you get sick of this message, lower the "diskspace_warn_threshold" in the config file. If you do this then don't forget to put it back after you add more disk space.
The usual way to add disk space is to symlink a directory on a new drive into the repository "documents" directory.
There are no available partitions with enough disk space to create new items. This needs sorting out urgently.
NO NEW ITEMS WILL BE ADDED UNTIL YOU FIX THIS.
To add more capacity, symlink a directory on a new drive into the repository "documents" directory.

epp:phrase.p: There is a problem with the form:
The search failed to execute correctly.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: A year search must be specified as a single year, e.g. `2000', or a range of years, e.g. `1990-2000', `1990-' or `-2000'
A numerical search must be specified as a single integer number, e.g. `23', or a range of numbers, e.g. `9-21', `17-' or `-93'
A date search must be specified as a single date or a range.
Search field contains no indexable words: "". The system ignores very small or common words.
Enter some text to search for.
Select one or more values from the list. Default is (Any).
Enter a term or terms to search for.

Enter a name or names to search for. Either the family name, or the family name followed by a comma and the first name or initial. Names with spaces may be indictated by surrounding them with double quotes, eg. "van Damme, J".
Select one or more values from the list, and whether you want to search for records with any one or all of those values. Default is (Any).
Select one or more values from the list, and whether you want to search for records with any one or all of those values. Default is (Any).
Select one or more values from the list, and whether you want to search for records with any one or all of those values. Default is (Any).
Enter one or more usernames (space seperated) and whether you want to search for records with any one or all of those values. Default is (Any).
Enter a term or terms to search for.
Enter a term or terms to search for.
Enter some text to search for.
Enter a single year (e.g. 1999), or a range of years, e.g. `1990-2000', `1990-' or -2000'.
Enter a single number (e.g. 93), or a range of numbers, e.g. `17-23', `17-' or -23'.
Select a single record ID number (e.g. 93), or a range of numbers, e.g. `17-23', `17-' or -23'.

epp:phrase.p: Please enter the URL of the item you wish to upload to the repository in the box below.

Occasionally, uploading this way may not produce a totally accurate copy. This is because some assumptions about the structure of the HTML must be made, to stop the software from trying to upload the whole World-Wide Web!
Enter the filename (with full path) of the compressed file in the box below.
Please enter the filename (with full path) of the document file in the box below.
Please enter the filenames (with full paths) of the document files in the boxes below.

epp:phrase.p: Please verify that all of the details about your deposit are correct, and that all necessary files have been correctly uploaded including any figures.
When you are satisfied click the Deposit Item Now button at the foot of this page.
Thank you.
Your submission will now be held for editorial review. Provided there are no problems it should appear in the repository within the next few days.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: I don't know who you are

epp:phrase.p: Please enter correct information about yourself for our records. This information will be useful to us and readers of your items. You don't have to supply all this information if you don't want to; you need only fill out those fields marked with a star to start using the repository.
For instructions on how to change your email address, click here.
You may update the users record.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: There was a problem reading the posted data and updating the database. Please try again later

p.epc:pin: Number of items user has in repository:

p.strong: You have no items in the repository.

epp:phrase.p: Below are listed your items in the repository. Click on the title of an item to view it.
New Version: This button makes a copy of the item in your workspace. Do this if you are going to submit an updated version of the item. Any attached files will also be copied.

Use as template: If you want to submit a similar item this button will create a new item in your workspacke using the current item as a template. This option will not link the new item to the old one. Any attached files will not be copied.
Request Removal: Request that the administrator removes this item.
Checkout Item: Return this item to your work area. This will mean it temporarily disappears from the repository.

p.em: Please note that we strongly discourage removal of items from the repository. If you upload a new version of an items, a link to the later version will appear on the older version. Thus, anyone finding the old version will be able to see that a newer version has been deposited.

epp:phrase.p: You are requesting the removal of:

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: Couldn't find that item! There's may be a problem with the database. Try again later.
Please enter the reason for removal. The request will be sent to the site administrator.

epp:phrase.p: User (Email: ) requests the removal of the following item:
The following reason was given:
To view the item and have the option to remove it, click here.
Your request has been sent the the administrator.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: You may not request the removal of this item

epp:phrase.p: To change your email address you should enter the new email below. The system will then mail you a URL to visit to activate this new address.
This system ensures that we always have a valid email address for you.
The email address we currently have for you is:
You did not actually supply a new email address.

This code is only valid for a short time
A user with the email address already exists.

Forcefully stops and cleans up the indexer, then restarts it.
Unable to start indexer. You should check the log file in for more information.
Unable to stop indexer. You should check the log file in for more information.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: Click here to go to the User Area

epp:phrase.p: This is the EPrints subject editor tool. You should be aware that it can make major changes which cannot be undone. If you remove a subject which is the only subject of an eprint then you will no longer be able to find that eprint via the browse views, only by the search.
Be careful. Think before deleting anything.
(Of course, if this is not a live repository, then it doesn't matter.)

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: The specified subject does not exist, or a database error has occured.

epp:phrase.p: Subject ID:
Enter the ID of an existing child which is NOT an ancestor of the subject, or enter an used subject id to create a new subject.

New child is an ancestor of this subject (This would cause a loop)

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: The specified ID code is not a valid ID code.
Please enter the ID code of the item you wish to view below. You can enter a standard ID code, an Open Archives full ID code, or just the digits on the right hand side of an ID code.

epp:phrase.p: Registration is not enabled on this system.
In order to access some areas of the repository, you'll need a user registration. No charge is made for registering with us or using any of our services.
This page lets you register with . This will allow you to save searches, recieve alerts and deposit items.
Your new password will need to confirm your email address by using a code which will be mailed to you.
If you have already registered but have forgotten your username or password, click here to set a new password.
You have not filled in the "" field.
A user with the email address already exists.
Rather than register, you should just reset your password.
Another user already has the username already exists.
You have registered with username .
This registration will not be activated until you visit the confirmation URL which has been emailed to

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: This will set which language is used for automated emails
This must be a valid email address.
A username must begin with a letter and only contain letters and numerals.
A combination of uppercase and lowercase letters and numerals.

epp:phrase.p: To register, use the Registration Form.
If you have registered but have forgotten the password you may set a new password using the Reset Password Form.
This feature is not available on this system.
If you are an existing user but have forgotten your password then you may use this form to set a new one.
You did not specify an email address.

This code is only valid for a short time
Nothing new in the last 7 days.
User not found. It is possible that indicates a database problem, but please check the parameters in the URL carefully.
The confirmation pin is incorrect. Please try and reset your password to generate an email with a new confirmation pin number.
The confirmation pin number has timed out. Please repeat the reset password or registration request, and confirm it as soon as you get the email.
There are currently no changes for this user which await confirmation. This probably means you have already confirmed the change. Try and login.
Your email address has been changed to

epp:phrase.p: Bad parameters. Do not try and access this script directly.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: Please select the most appropriate type for your deposit.
If this item is a revised version of another document in the repository, please enter its ID code in this box.
If your item is a commentary on another item (or author's response to a commentary) in the repository, please enter its ID in this box.
Leaving this field blank will not affect the password. If you change your password you will be logged out.
Set a password. This will not be activated until you enter a security code which will be mailed to you.
The subjects within which this user may "edit" eprints. That is they may review and approve/bounce them etc.
The email address for this user
Your preferred language. Where possible information will be mailed in this language.
The user will only be able to approve and modify items which match the following rules. If there are no restriction conditions the user will be able to edit any item.
How often do you want to be sent a list of all the items in editorial review matching your editorial rights.
If there are items in editorial review, within your editorial rights, should the repository still send you an empty email?

Yes, mail me when editorial review is empty.
No. Only mail me when there is something I can edit and approve.
Please indicate the primary language of this format.
Please select the storage format of this document.
You may offer an additional brief description of the format.
Please indicate the required "security level" of this document. Who is allowed to download it?
Specify an explicit license for this document (does not effect the access rights you grant at the end of this deposit process).

The date that a publisher- or sponsor-imposed embargo expires. On and after this date, this document will be made publically accessible.
Example: 2006 - all documents made publically accessible on 1st January 2006
Example: 2006 June - all documents made publically accessible on 1st June 2006
The file which is linked to.
This is the "screen" name of the subject, the one that the users will see.
Can users add items to this subject?

Yes, users can add items to this subject.
No. (In which case it should probably have some children.

This is the internal key for this subject. It is used in the database and to generate the "views" filenames. It shoud contain only a-z, 0-9 and dash "/"and underscore "_". If you enter the ID of an existing subject then that subject will be linked as a child of the current subject.
This screen () does not know how to process this action: .
The requested screen does not exist, or has a fatal error: .
You may not view this screen: .
You may not perform that action.
Modify this Account (including changing username and user type)
Sorry, you are not able to use any tools
Could not deposit due to validation errors.
Could not deposit for some reason.
Your item will not appear on the public website until it has been checked by an editor.
Remove this item from the system forever, but send an email to the user who deposited it to inform them why.
Return this item from to the user work area and send an email to the user who deposited it to explain why it cannot yet be accepted.
Remove this item from the system forever.
Problem changing status of item with the ID "".
Return to user work area, allowing the user to make changes to it and re-deposit it.
Removes the item from the archive.
Use this to submit a new version of this item. It will create an exact copy which you can then make changes to. This item and the new version will be linked.
Create a new item using this item as a template. There will be no connection between the two items.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: New or changed items matching this search will be mailed to you.
How often do you want to be sent this alert? A setting of "never" disables this alert.
If there are no new items matching your saved search, since it was last mailed, do you still want to be mailed?

Yes, mail me empty alerts.
No. Only mail me alerts with content.
You may enter a rationale for requesting this document.

epp:phrase.p: This item has been requested from the by . Please can you respond.
The following reason was given:
Please consider removing restrictions or uploading the full text to the archive so that it will be available immediately to future searchers.
To send the requested document, click here.
To reject the request, click here.
Your request has been sent.
Your request for the following item has been passed on for action:
If you do not receive a reply or need advice at a later time please contact . For items with copyright implications, you may also be able to contact your local interlibrary loan service.
You have chosen to accept the request for the following item:
An acceptance notice will be emailed to the requester with the requested document attached.
You have chosen to reject the request for the following item:
You may enter a reason below if you wish. This will be emailed to the requester along with a rejection notice.
This item has been made publically accessible since the request was made:
A notice will be emailed to the requester.

epp:phrases.epp:phrase: Tick this box to make this document publically available from now on.

epp:phrase.p: Your request for the following item has been accepted:
Please find the requested document attached.
Your request for the following item has been rejected:
It may not always be straightforward to provide full text. Your local library may also be able to help you. For more general queries you may also contact
The following reason was given:
The item you requested is now publically accessible:
Thank you. The email has been sent to the requester.
